DataElement.preferredName: Patient HER2 Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the status of whether a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according to a patient's tumor containing HER2 activating mutations.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient HER2 Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to HER2 Activating Mutation as an element of the personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 Measurement Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 present in a sample.:Any detectable and heritable change in the genetic material that causes a change in the GENOTYPE and which is transmitted to daughter cells and to succeeding generations.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.longName: Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 Measurement
Concepts.definition: The determination of the amount of human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 present in a sample.
Any detectable and heritable change in the genetic material that causes a change in the GENOTYPE and which is transmitted to daughter cells and to succeeding generations.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Updated to include concept codes & change workflow status to "Released", JG 07/11/2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient's tumor must have act
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient's tumor must have activating HER2 mutation as determined by the MATCH NGS assay. These mutations include: D769Y, P780_Y781insGSP, V777L, L755_S760>A, M774_A775insAYVM, G309A, G309E, D769H, L755S, V842I, A775_G776insYVMA, E321G, S310F, S310Y. Additionally, any inframe insertions in exon 20 will be considered an activating mutation.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the HER2 evaluation based on local site immunohistochemistry (IHC), fluorescent in-situ hybridization (FISH), or local/commercial next generation sequencing (NGS)?
